text: In the 2001–02 season, USM Alger is competing in the National for the 22nd time, as well as the Algerian Cup. It is their 7th consecutive season in the top flight of Algerian football. They will be competing in Ligue 1, the African Cup Winners' Cup and the Algerian Cup. ==Pre-season and friendlies== ==Competitions== ===Overview=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan=2|Competition !colspan=8|Record |- ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! |- | National |- | Algerian Cup |- | Cup Winners' Cup |- !
